name: ProductBoard
description: ProductBoard integration for managing features, products, and customer feedback

cacheTtlSeconds.description: Cache TTL in seconds for read operations

apiToken.label: ProductBoard API Token
apiToken.helpText: Get your API token from ProductBoard Settings > Integrations > Public API

apiBaseUrl.label: API Base URL
apiBaseUrl.helpText: Only change if using a custom ProductBoard instance

cacheTtlSeconds.label: Cache TTL (seconds)
cacheTtlSeconds.helpText: How long to cache read operations
